title: A Snowy Day
summary: This book introduces a snowy day, showing how children play with snow and build a snowman using snowballs, buttons, hats, scarves, and more.

preQuestions.question: What do you like to do on a snowy day?

postQuestions.question: What do you need to make a snowman?

missions.title: Build Your Own Snowman
missions.description: Use snow or draw a picture to make your own snowman. Don’t forget the scarf and hat!

vocabulary.definition: A figure made of snow, often decorated with a hat, scarf, and buttons.
A ball made of snow, often rolled by hand.
